word: When questioned, \93Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days?\94 Jesus answered, \93What man shall there be among you, that shall have one sheep, and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day, will he not lay hold on it, and lift it out? How much then is a man better than a sheep? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days\94 (Matthew 12:10-12).
